org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.matchers.psystem

Interface PConstraint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasePConstraint, BaseTypeSafeConstraint, BinaryTransitiveClosure, ConstantValue, Containment, CoreModelRelationship, DeferredPConstraint, EnumerablePConstraint, Equality, ExportedParameter, ExpressionEvaluation, Generalization, Inequality, Instantiation, KeyedEnumerablePConstraint, NegativePatternCall, PatternCallBasedDeferred, PatternMatchCounter, PositivePatternCall, TypeBinary, TypeConstraint, TypeTernary, TypeUnary, VariableDeferredPConstraint

    public interface PConstraint
    Author:
    Gabor Bergmann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkSanity() 
      void delete() 
      java.util.Set<PVariable> getAffectedVariables()
      All variables affected by this constraint.
      java.util.Set<PVariable> getDeducedVariables()
      The set of variables whose potential values can be enumerated (once all non-deduced variables have known values).
      java.util.Map<java.util.Set<PVariable>,java.util.Set<PVariable>> getFunctionalDependencies()
      A (preferably minimal) cover of known functional dependencies between variables.
      int getMonotonousID()
      Returns an integer ID that is guaranteed to increase strictly monotonously for constraints within a pBody.
      void replaceVariable(PVariable obsolete, PVariable replacement) 

    • Method Detail

      • getAffectedVariables

        java.util.Set<PVariable> getAffectedVariables()
        All variables affected by this constraint.

      • getDeducedVariables

        java.util.Set<PVariable> getDeducedVariables()
        The set of variables whose potential values can be enumerated (once all non-deduced variables have known values).

      • getFunctionalDependencies

        java.util.Map<java.util.Set<PVariable>,java.util.Set<PVariable>> getFunctionalDependencies()
        A (preferably minimal) cover of known functional dependencies between variables.
        Returns:
        non-trivial functional dependencies in the form of {variables} --> {variables}, where dependencies with the same lhs are unified.

                     PVariable replacement)

      • getMonotonousID

        int getMonotonousID()
        Returns an integer ID that is guaranteed to increase strictly monotonously for constraints within a pBody.
